name: chrelyonly-ffmpeg-api
description: 基于FFmpeg的多媒体处理API服务 - 提供视频、图像和GIF处理功能

scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const rimraf = (dir) => { if (fs.existsSync(dir)) { fs.readdirSync(dir).forEach(f => { const p = path.join(dir, f); if (fs.lstatSync(p).isDirectory()) rimraf(p); else fs.unlinkSync(p); }); fs.rmdirSync(dir); } }; rimraf('temp'); rimraf('cache');"
